metadata.description: Meet Marvin Elwood, timid teenager... and possible savior of Earth! Heir to alien Kree technology and the awesome Nega Bands, Marvin must face his legacy as ? Captain Marvel! But can even this cosmic crusader save the world from the gigantic threat of Galactus? Guest-starring the Megascale Metatalent Response Team Fantastic Four!
metadata.name: Marvel Mangaverse
